                                             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generates the digest header using SHA-512 algorithm
        Parameters:
        body - the string that should be passed as argument to the hashing function
        Returns:
        a String representing the result of the hashing function encoded in Base64
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • generateDateHeader

        public static java.lang.String generateDateHeader()
        Generates the date header the format of the date should be the following: "EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss z"
        Returns:
        a String containing the date header content

                                                  SecurePersistenceManager securePersistenceManager)
                                           throws ProtoCoreError
        Generates the Authorization header
        Parameters:
        stringToSign - the string generated from the mandatory header that has to be signed in order to be verified by the server
        Returns:
        the content of the Authorization header
        Throws:
        ProtoCoreError

                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                  ProtoCoreError
        Fills the headers with the correct values
        Parameters:
        requestBuilder - the Request.Builder instance which will perform the requests
        originalRequest - the Request the original request trapped by an interceptor
        Returns:
        a request builder that will build a request with all needed headers filled
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • checkSignatureResponse

        public static boolean checkSignatureResponse(java.lang.String authHeader,
                                             okhttp3.Response response,
                                             SecurePersistenceManager securePersistenceManager,
                                             byte[] body)
                                      throws ProtoCoreError
        Check whether the signature returned from wally is correct
        Parameters:
        authHeader - the authorization header received from wally
        response - the Response obtained by the server
        securePersistenceManager - an instance of SecurePersistenceManager which contains the useful information for the signature
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the check was successful or not
        Throws:
        ProtoCoreError
